content.text: 0) DAY BEFORE: Cream butter and cream cheese together until smoothly blended.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( cond-0-0 "DAY BEFORE"@3:13 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Cream"@15:20 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "butter"@21:27 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "cream cheese"@32:44 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-0-1 "until smoothly blended"@54:76 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Shape dough into a smooth ball, wrap in foil or cling wrap, and refrigerate overnight or up to a week.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Shape"@3:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "dough"@9:14 / FOOD )
		:reshape ( "a smooth ball"@20:33 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "wrap"@35:39 / AC
		:instrument ( tool-2-0 "foil"@43:47 / TOOL )
		:instrument ( tool-2-1 "cling wrap"@51:61 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-2 "refrigerate"@67:78 / AC
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "overnight"@79:88 / DUR )
		:duration ( dur-2-1 "up to a week"@92:104 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 3) AT BAKING TIME: Remove dough from refrigerator 30 minutes before using.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "Remove"@19:25 / AC
		:ppt ( "dough"@26:31 / FOOD )
		:source ( tool-3-0 "refrigerator"@37:49 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-3-0 "30 minutes"@50:60 / DUR )
		:duration ( cond-3-0 "before using"@61:73 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Start heating oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "heating"@9:16 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-4-0 "oven"@17:21 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "375 degrees F"@25:38 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-4-1 "190 degrees C"@40:53 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) Cut with 3 or 4 inch round cookie cutter.
7) Place small spoonful of jam in center of each round, moisten edges with water.
8) Fold round over and press edges together.
9) Bake on ungreased cookie sheet 15 to 20 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-9 / R
	:inform ( ac-9-0 "Bake"@4:8 / AC
		:loc ( tool-9-0 "ungreased cookie sheet"@12:34 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-9-0 "15 to 20 minutes"@35:51 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Immediately roll in sugar mixed with cinnamon (traditional) OR in confectioners' sugar if preferred.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "roll in"@16:23 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "OR"@-1:-1 / CHOICE
			:option ( "sugar mixed with cinnamon"@24:49 / FOOD 
				:ref ing-4
				:ref ing-5)
			:option ( "confectioners' sugar"@70:90 / FOOD )
		)
	)
)
